Package com.datasalt.pangool.solr

Interface Summary
TupleDocumentConverter Implementations will map ITuple to SolrInputDocument.
 

Class Summary
BatchWriter Enables adding batches of documents to an EmbeddedSolrServer.
DefaultTupleDocumentConverter This default TupleDocumentConverter maps a ITuple to a SolrInputDocument using primitive Schema.Field types.
HeartBeater This class runs a background thread that once ever 5 seconds checks to see if a progress report is needed.
SolrRecordWriter Instantiate a record writer that will build a Solr index.
TupleSolrOutputFormat Instantiable OutputFormat that can be used in Pangool for indexing ITuple in SOLR.
